snippet.title: Cube Escape Collection - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Finally! The Cube Escape Collection will be released on October 14th on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1292940/Cube_Escape_Collection/

Follow the path of Dale, Laura and other Rusty lake characters like Mr. Crow and Mr. Owl in this classic point-and-click adventure anthology! The nine Cube Escape games are updated (achievements / hints / translations), preserved and bundled to survive the end of the Flash Games era.

Thanks for your support 🖤

Trailer and voice-over by: Bob Rafferty
Music credits:
‘Gymnopedie no 3’ and ‘Steel and Seething’
"By Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/"
